paper.title: An Elliptic Curve Implementation of the Finite Field Digital Signature Algorithm

keywords.keyword: Hessian form of an elliptic curve

paper.abstract: We construct a supersingular implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) that is essentially equivalent to a finite field implementation of the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA), and then we compare the efficiency of the two systems. The elliptic curve method is about 12 times faster. In the last section we use the same ideas to give a particularly efficient nonsupersingular implementation of elliptic curve cryptography in characteristic 7.
